info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 12:49PM CDT until July 02 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Madison County in southeastern Missouri... Southeastern St. Francois County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 1249 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fredericktown, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Fredericktown around 105 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Junction City and Cobalt. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
